snippet.title: Viscometry for liquids : calibration of viscometers
snippet.description: Viscometry for liquids : calibration of viscometers / Gupta, S V This book is written for scientists involved in the calibration of viscometers [...] Cham : Springer, 2014. (Springer Series in Materials Science ; 194)

snippet.title: A near-field scanning microwave microscope based on a superconducting resonator for low power measurements
snippet.description: A near-field scanning microwave microscope based on a superconducting resonator for low power measurements / de Graaf, S E ; Danilov, A V ; Adamyan, A ; Kubatkin, S E We report on the design and performance of a cryogenic (300 mK) near-field scanning microwave microscope. It uses a microwave resonator as the near-field sensor, operating at a frequency of 6 GHz and microwave probing amplitudes down to 100 uV, approaching low enough photon population (N~1000) of the resonator such that coherent quantum manipulation becomes feasible. [...] arXiv:1404.0534.- 2014 \- Published in : Rev. Sci. Instrum. 84 (2013) 023706 External link: Preprint

snippet.title: OFFLINE
snippet.description: OFFLINE / Fabio Cossutti ; Peter Elmer ; and SEXTON-KENNEDY Elizabeth The second half of 2013 has been devoted to the validation of the 6_2_X cycle, while developing the 7_0_X one. In order to cope with the needs of the Physics group, its deadline has been extended till the beginning of next year. [...] CMSBUL-ARTICLE-2013-047.- 2013 \- Published in : , no. 3/2013, pp. 13

snippet.title: Morphological Parameters of Spitzer Survey of Stellar Structure in Galaxies (S4G)
snippet.description: Morphological Parameters of Spitzer Survey of Stellar Structure in Galaxies (S4G) / Holwerda, B W (ESA) ; Munoz-Mateos, J-C (NRAO) ; Comeron, S (Oulu) ; Meidt, S (MPIA) ; Sheth, K (NRAO) ; Laine, S (SSC) ; Hinz, J L (Steward) ; Regan, M W (STSCI) ; Gil-de-Paz, A (Madrid) ; Menendez-Delmestre, K (Carnegie) et al. The morphology of galaxies can be quantified to some degree using a set of scale-invariant parameters. [...] arXiv:1309.1444. \- 2013\. - 22 p. Preprint

Power transmissions : 4th International Conference \- Power transmissions 20 - 23 Jun 2012 \- Sinaia, Romania / Dobre, George (ed.) This books contains the Proceedings of the 4th International Conference on Power Transmissions, that was held in Sinaia, Romania from June 20 -23, 2012. Power Transmissions is a very complex and multi-disciplinary scientific field of Mechanical Engineering that covers the different types of transmissions (mechanical, hydraulic, pneumatic) as well as all the machine elements involved, such as gears, bearings, shafts, couplings and a lot more. [...] Heidelberg : Springer, 2013 e-proceedings

snippet.title: Report on the piezoelectric frequency effect in quartz and its possibility in other piezoelectric materials
snippet.description: Report on the piezoelectric frequency effect in quartz and its possibility in other piezoelectric materials / Hou, Yubin ; Lu, Qingyou We report the eigen-frequency shift induced by an applied voltage on quartz material. [...] arXiv:1212.5990. \- 2012\. Preprint

snippet.title: Parallel-sequencing of early-type and spiral galaxies
snippet.description: Parallel-sequencing of early-type and spiral galaxies / Cappellari, Michele (University of Oxford) Since Edwin Hubble introduced his famous tuning fork diagram more than 70 years ago, spiral galaxies and early-type galaxies (ETGs) have been regarded as two distinct families. [...] arXiv:1211.3998. \- 2012\. Preprint
